Bellapais Monastery Village
Bellapais Monastery Village is located at the foot of the Five Finger Mountain Range with panoramic views of Kyrenia Town and its new harbour. The Hotel is situated approximately 2 miles from Kyrenia Town and within walking distance of Bellapais Village and Abbey. Bellapais Monastery Village is a luxury hotel with 60 rooms and a bed capacity of 130. There is a choice of 16 twin-bedded hotel rooms with balcony, 45 mini villas with terrace and 2 suites with jacuzzi bath and balcony. All the accommodation is air-conditioned and furnished to a very high standard. Other facilities include shower, direct dial telephone, satellite TV, safe, minibar and hair dryer. A kettle and cups are provided in each room.
